sentences.en: An attempt by anti-abortionists to tighten the rules was defeated.
sentences.cn: 反堕胎者所作的加强法规的尝试失败了。

sentences.en: Back come orders: tighten this muscle, relax that one.
sentences.cn: 传回的命令是,拉紧这一条肌肉, 放松那一条.

sentences.en: Clearly, if you are spending more than your income, you'll need to tighten your belt.
sentences.cn: 明摆着，要是你入不敷出，你就得省着点了。

sentences.en: I used my thumbnail to tighten the screw on my lamp.
sentences.cn: 我用拇指指甲把台灯上的螺钉拧紧了。

sentences.en: I want us to be a bit more sensible this time and tighten up.
sentences.cn: 我要求我们这次要更加理智、更加严格要求自己。

sentences.en: I’d put the new tyre on, but I hadn’t tightened up the wheel.
sentences.cn: 我把新轮胎装上了，但没有上紧轮子。

sentences.en: It would be unseemly for judges to receive pay increases when others are having to tighten their belts.
sentences.cn: 在其他人正不得不勒紧裤腰带的时候，给法官提高薪水是不合适的。

sentences.en: It's important to tighten up the wheels properly, otherwise they vibrate loose and fall off.
sentences.cn: 把轮子拧紧是很重要的，否则它们会因振动松动、脱落。

sentences.en: She saw his jaw tighten and his face lose its colour.
sentences.cn: 她看见他的下巴绷紧，脸色煞白。

sentences.en: Take your spanner, and tighten the nut.
sentences.cn: 把你的扳手拿来, 把螺帽拧紧.

sentences.en: The strap is too loose. Tighten it up a bit.
sentences.cn: 带子太松了, 再勒一勒.

sentences.en: The thought of Nick made her throat tighten.
sentences.cn: 一想到尼克，她的喉咙就发紧。

sentences.en: They are now under a great deal of pressure to tighten their airport security.
sentences.cn: 他们现在承受着加强机场安保措施的巨大压力。

sentences.en: This treatment helps tone the body, firm up muscles and tighten the skin.
sentences.cn: 该治疗有助于强身健体、紧致皮肤。

sentences.en: Turn the screw to the right to tighten it.
sentences.cn: 向右转动螺钉把它拧紧.

sentences.en: Until this week, every attempt to tighten up the law had failed.
sentences.cn: 到本周为止，一切旨在严格执法的努力都失败了。

words.tran_cn: 紧的；密封的；绷紧的；麻烦的；严厉的；没空的；吝啬的

phrases.tran_cn: 加强；使紧密；拉紧；使更牢固

trans.tran_en: to close or fasten something firmly by turning it

trans.tran_cn: 收紧，（使）变紧，（使）绷紧，加紧

trans.tran_en: to close or fasten something firmly by turning it
